summary: This is a replacer to Craftable Arrows COMPATIBLE with Duel - Combat Realism.  As a bonus, I put 2 new arrows!
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=7]Duel - Craftable Arrows[/size][/b]

[size=5][b][color=yellow]**Thank you for your endorsement![/color][/b][/size]


[b]CHANGE LOG v2.1[/b] -- by IsharaMeradin
- Damascus arrows are located in Imperial category; this is due to the fact that steel smithing was required and since the Imperials are loosely based on the Romans and Damascus was ruled by Rome... it fit in my mind  :P
- Diamond arrows are located in Glass category; this is due to the fact that glass smithing was required.
- Optional file offered which has only the Diamond and Damascus arrows. I noticed that with other mods which also modify the game\'s stock arrows there would be multiple recipes providing the same arrow.  

[b]CHANGE LOG v2[/b]  all done by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4628100-isharameradin/]IsharaMeradin[/url]!  He deserve kudos!
- Sorted arrows;
- Fixed the issue which I reported about the Damascus arrows being picked up from the ground as Steel arrows;
- Moving the arrows into their respective categories. Only Damascus and Diamond remain in Misc now;


[b]FIRST RELEASE v1.0[/b]

Original \"Craftable Arrows\" (from link428) mod was incompatible with Duel - Combat Realism.. after looking at the file, lots of things wasn\'t (unfortunately) coded accordingly..  This is a difficult task as the CK isn\'t released yet.  So I decided to code the whole mod in a new version, fixing the issues.  I tweaked it to fit smiting skills too.  Finally, as a bonus I gives away 2 new ammo to be created in the forge!

[b]Featuring[/b]
- Duel - Expansion Pack compatibility;
- Now you must have appropriate skills before smiting an arrow.. need to be able to smith Ebony before creating Ebony arrows.
- 2 new arrows: Diamond Arrow and Damascus Arrow.


Craftable Arrows:
- Iron Arrow
- Steel Arrow
- Dwarven Arrow
- Orcish Arrow
- Ebony Arrow
- Daedric Arrow
- Elven Arrow
- Glass Arrow
- Diamond Arrow
- Damascus Arrow


[b]OTHER DUEL MODS:[/b]
Duel - Combat Realism at http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2700
Duel - Expansion Pack at http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6446

Enjoy!
author: LogRaam
